meanings.definition: A person or machine that organizes items in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent1: The alphabetizers at the library help keep the books in order.
meanings.sent2: I used the alphabetizers on my computer to sort my files.
meanings.sent3: The alphabetizers at the post office made sure all the packages were in the right order.
meanings.sent4: She was like an alphabetizer, neatly arranging the letters in perfect sequence.
meanings.sent5: The alphabetizers worked tirelessly to alphabetize the documents for easy reference.
